steps.comment: If we get an "older" result back from the common, it is presumably cached. We want to retry with recache on
steps.label: output/cache/lastModified > lastModified

steps.comment: If hasRole is true, you either have the role or a role handler is not configured. Check permission as well.
steps.label: output/content/editable

steps.comment: If hasRole is true, you either have the role or a role handler is not configured. Check permission as well.
steps.label: output/content/testable

steps.comment: If you can edit, we need to be able to differentiate between environment specific and not
steps.label: true

steps.comment: If you can't edit, we add the properties to the generic properties. No need to leak this tiny bit of implementation detail
Sort translations for predictable cache key
